title: Hollywood Producer Brian Grazer On The Importance Of Looking People In The Eye
text:
Legendary Hollywood Producer Brian Grazer, author of the new book "Face to Face: The Art of Human Connection", spoke with Brian Kilmeade about his career, his grandmother helping him overcome Dyslexia, Ron Howard teaching him the importance of personal communication and looking people in the eye to create a connection, how having a weekly goal of meeting people outside of your industry helps exercise the brain and how a conversation with Old Dirty Bastard led him to produce the movie 8 Mile, the Made In America Jay Z concert, and the hit TV series Empire.

Plus, Brian Grazer on all of the actors who were considered for the lead role in Apollo 13 before Tom Hanks.
